tools.name: bnet_to_bnd_and_cfg
tools.description: Process a bnet file and generate corresponding BND and CFG files using MaBoSS

tools.name: build_simulation
tools.description: Build a MaBoSS simulation from BND and CFG files

tools.name: get_maboss_initial_state
tools.description: Get the initial state configuration for MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: get_maboss_logical_rules
tools.description: Get the logical rules from the MaBoSS model

tools.name: get_maboss_mutations
tools.description: Get the mutations configuration for MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: update_maboss_parameters
tools.description: Update parameters for the MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: set_maboss_output_nodes
tools.description: Set the output nodes for MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: set_maboss_initial_state
tools.description: Set the initial state for specific nodes in MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: simulate_mutation
tools.description: Simulate mutations by setting nodes to specific states

tools.name: visualize_network_trajectories
tools.description: Visualize network trajectories from MaBoSS simulation results

tools.name: get_simulation_result
tools.description: Get the results from the MaBoSS simulation

tools.name: check_bnd_and_cfg_name
tools.description: Check the validity of BND and CFG file names

tools.name: clean_bnd_and_cfg
tools.description: Clean BND and CFG files from the working directory
